EVENTS
EVENTS
December Soundbath
Soundbath December 10th 4.30pm
Join us for a fantastically chilled and healing soundbath complete with singing bowls, chimes, gongs and drums. We spend a relaxing hour cocooned in cosy blankets allowing the vibrations to permeate the room and our consciousness. Follow the guided meditation or just allow your mind to wander. Followed by optional refreshments. Bring with you a yoga or camping mat, a blanket or quilt and cushion or pillow. Some items will be available to borrow at the clinic on a first come, first served basis.
Location - ReCoop Health, Aston Road, CV11 5DT

Workshops, Reiki Dojo & Potions Club
Sessions are held at the Therapy Rooms, ReCoop Health , Aston Rd, Nuneaton, CV11 5DT.
PRE -BOOKING FOR EVENTS IS ESSENTIAL
Potions Club
Potions Club is a monthly formulation club where we learn about how to mix aromatherapy blends and formulate our own cosmetics, skincare and green cleaning products.
Past sessions have included creating bespoke facial masks, making Chocolate Body Velvet whipped body butter, tailored cleansers, pulse blends and bath oils - not to mention reed diffusers.
Monthly themes are updated regularly so click on the icon to go to the Potions Club page to see what's coming and to book in.
Pre booking is essential so we can ensure everyone has all the ingredients they need. Great fun but informative and practical too.
Reiki Dojo
A friendly, inclusive Reiki share circle and community with the option of Reiki training at all levels. Our community meets monthly to share Reiki together. The circle also spends time in guided meditations and strengthening energy work.
Everyone is welcome, whether you have never heard of Reiki and are curious to learn more or are a seasoned Reiki Master or Teacher.
Members can simply attend, receive attunements or undertake their next level Reiki raining, there's no obligation to do so to be a member but it's an option.
All levels of training can be pursued.
Workshops
All of the community workshops are lead by a qualified teacher, Lindsey, so a high standard of teaching is assured. All workshops aim to share safe, simple and effective therapeutic techniques for families to use at home.
The emphasis on these sessions is on safety and good technique so you can be confident you have the skills to share with your nearest and dearest. Lindsey wants everyone to have access to therapies for self care and to safeguard wellbeing. Touch therapies are an excellent way to promote health and support communication and enhance relationships.
These sessions aren't accredited professional therapy training, which Lindsey also offers, so if you are interested in training to become a professional therapist, please get in touch! brookes.beauty@gmail.com

Professional, accredited training by experienced tutors.
We offer Introductory and postgraduate accredited professional therapy training at our clinic in Nuneaton, Warwickshire. We're really accessible, being located close to the M1, M6, M69 and a short, direct walk from Nuneaton train station.
Our courses comprise of CPD training for qualified practitioners and longer skills based learning for those wishing to become qualified therapists. Our courses are accredited, insurable and taught to a very high standard by an experienced teacher, Lindsey Brookes.
Lindsey has over 25 years teaching experience and has a thriving private complementary therapy practice. She creates an inclusive environment for everyone to learn in her beautiful clinic. Professional therapy courses and CPD postgraduate courses are accredited and insurable. Attendance, Introductory and community courses are open to everyone. Lindsey also offers courses in how to launch and grow your own therapy business to ensure success with your new skills. An optional mentored case study programme is also available to support new therapists following their initla practical training.
Use the forms below to register your interest and we will happily provide all the information you need.

Reflexology
Reflexology is a relaxing complementary therapy, based on the theory that different points on the feet, lower leg, hands, face or ears correspond with different areas of the body.
The experience is deeply soothing and relaxing, has immense comforting benefits for mental health and sleep difficulties and is suitable for patients undergoing palliative care. Lindsey works holistically with clients, mindful of any medical treatment they are receiving, to promote better health and wellbeing.
Benefits of reflexology can include:
- Stress reduction and anxiety relief
- Improved sleep
- Increased circulation and feeling of comfort in feet and lower legs
- Emotional support
Full Reflexology treatments are 1 hour - £45
Reflexology can be combined with other treatments in appointments for 60, 90 or 120 minutes.
A fantastic Combination is the Head in the Clouds Treatment which includes Indan Head Massage and Reflexology. Foot Smoothing with Reflexology is a great combination if you have dry skin on the feet.
Contact us directly for personalised advice and guidance on whether treatments are suitable for your individual needs, text or whatsapp 07966389702.

Treatments & Therapies
All of our Complementary and Holistic treatments are bespoke and totally personalised to each individual client.
Our experienced therapists are proficient in a wide range of techniques. We tailor each client’s session to their personal needs and preferences and are mindful of their budget.
All treatments are available in 30, 60, 90 or 120 minute sessions and include aromatherapy as standard, unless inappropriate or contraindicated. Any therapy can be combined during a bespoke appointment e.g. a facial with back massage or Reflexology with a back or Indian Head Massage, time permitting.
Since the practice strives to be as ecologically sound as possible we use only premium luxury products that are effective and have impeccable ethical credentials. Always natural, organic where possible. If you wish to avoid certain ingredients or would like a purely vegan treatment, please ask prior to your treatment so we can prepare correctly.

About Me
I am a passionate advocate of Complementary Therapies since spending most of my 20’s living and working in Japan. Contributing to Japan’s impressive longevity and well-being statistics is the mainstream nature of holistic therapies like massage, shiatsu, reflexology, which are viewed as standard self-care activities to maintain good life balance and wellbeing. Having benefitted significantly from regular therapy treatments myself and the natural approach to self-care and illness prevention, I was overjoyed to realise a long-held dream to retrain as a professional therapist following my return to the UK.
I work with respected partners such as Neal’s Yard Remedies Organic and other premium luxury brands with impeccable ecological credentials and a strong reputation for outstanding effectiveness which means my clients get the absolute best in terms of the quality of their treatments and the professional grade products used. These are also available for clients to purchase to continue to get results at home between treatments.

Birthday and hen do proivate Pop Up Spas and parties are available.

WORKPLACE WELLBEING
Tailored Programmes & Pop Up Stations
Brookes Beauty fields a team of experienced, fully qualified and insured therapists who come to your workplace or organisation.
to British businesses due to stress, many companies, small and large, are instituting Workplace Wellbeing programmes, as
recommended by the Health and Safety Executive.
Our programmes help to manage and reduce stress at work, applying short but effective 20 minute sessions per client.
We offer a range of treatments, designed for both groups and individuals from Relaxation sessions, Reiki and Reflexology, to Indian Head and Accupressure Massage, delivered to employees in the workplace.
Clients remain fully clothed throughout and return to their desks refreshed, pleasantly alert and gently energised.
We arrive and set up in a quiet area in your place of work and deliver treatments. We aim to make our service as flexible as possible, to fit in with the requirements of your workforce.

Bee Lovely Top To Toe Ritual
This treatment treats the whole body starting with a deeply luxurious and soothing full body massage with the Bee Lovely All Over Body Balm and Body Butter. Special attention is paid to the feet, head with scalp massage and a lifting, scultping toning facal. It preps skin beautifully for Summer holidays, pampers Winter skin and gives a fragrant hydrating treat. Suitable for all skins, including sensitive.
Bee Lovely Top to Toe Ritual £85 (105 minutes)
Head in the Clouds Ritual
Delightful relaxing Indian Head massage with optional oil and scalp treatment (can be performed dry). Dispelling tension in the neck, shoulders, head and face. Coupled with a full Foot Reflexology sequence which takes care of the base, promoting deep relaxation and stress relief. The beauty of this deeply relaxing treatment is the whole body benefits, you leave feeeling nourished, cherished and peaceful.

Wild Rose Full Body Glow Ritual
This gorgeous treatment hits every spot, includes exfoliation, full body massage, scalp treatment, signature Glow facial and smoothing foot treatment. It is aromatic, blissful and deeply relaxing. Available as a gift voucher, this is a 2 hour indulgence and not to be missed.
Wild Rose Full body Glow Ritual £95 (120 minutes)
Smoothing Aromatic Body Ritual
The smoothing ritual includes a free gift, a natural sisal exfoliation mitt that can be used at home to keep skin soft. Beginning with a light dry exfoliation with your sisal mitt, there follows a full body massage with the specially formulated Aromatic Body Butter. It includes an exfoliating foot treatment using fragrant body polish and massage with hydrating foot balm . This beautiful treatment leaves skin nourished and hydrated and beautifully fragrant.

Clinical Aromatherapy Service
The Clinical Aromatherapy Service is a personalised service designed to serve individual clients anywhere who seek complementary remedies to support their health and well being.
Our Clinical Aromatherapist, Lindsey Brookes, consults with clients either by phone, email, Skype or face to face and takes a full client health history, is essential to deliver a safe fully insured service. This information is protected by the Data Protection Act and is held in complete confidence. Please see our Data Protection Policy.
Depending on your needs and preferences, products will be created for your use. Common ailments that can be successfully resolved using aromatherapy are stress, anxiety, sleep and hormonal problems, pain (muscular and nerve), circulatory, inflammatory, stiffness and tension.
Enquiry for Fragrant Pharmacy Services

Reiki Treatments & Reiki Courses
Reiki is a Japanese technique for stress reduction and relaxation that also promotes healing. It is administered by the practitioner laying their hands on or above the client or recipient who is fully clothed and is based on the idea that an unseen "life force energy" flows through us. If one's life force energy is low, we are more likely to feel unwell or stressed. We are more likely to feel well, strong and content when our energy is balanced and strong.
The word Reiki is made of two Japanese words - Rei which means "God's Wisdom or the Higher Power" and Ki which is "life force energy". So Reiki is actually "spiritually guided life force energy."
The feelings experienced during a treatment vary from person to person. Reported effects include the whole or parts of the body enjoying feelings of a glowing radiance that flows through and around you, pools of warmth, seeing colours and a sense of enhanced perception.
Reiki treats the whole person including body, emotions, mind and spirit creating many beneficial effects that include relaxation and feelings of peace, security and wellbeing.
Reiki Treatments

POTIONS CLUB
POTIONS CLUB
What is Potions Club?
Potions Club is a fascinating monthly mash up of dabbling with essential oils and creating luxe home skincare and products - all while saving the planet and our pennies too!
Fancy mixing your own lotions and potions? Love a bit of kitchen witchery?
If you ever tried to make 'Rose Petal Perfume' as a child & felt disappointed with the results, you are going to LOVE Potions Club!
It's also an opportunity to learn how to use essential oils and simple aromatherapy blending techniques to use safely in the home. Some of our blends are designed to be effective home remedies and some are more for pleasure.
As we go along, we'll learn a bit about the body, how to care for your skin and how to make beautiful, unique handmade gifts easily and simply at home for your loved ones. Every session will include make and takes so you get to enjoy your creations at home and you also get the workbook or manual to keep recreating them time and again.
Check out the calendar below for upcoming sessions and to get tickets.
PRE BOOKING IS ESSENTIAL TO ENSURE EVERY POTIONEER IS PROVIDED FOR!
All ingredients and equipment provided.
Date: Saturday 18th June 2022 Time: 2 - 5:00 PM
Location: Brookes Beauty @ReCoop Health, Aston Road, Abbey Green, Nuneaton, CV11 5DT - Free Parking
June Potions Club Workshop - Whipped Body Butter & Aroma blends to support anxiety
Learn about creating your own herbal, infused, medicinal oils for use in your own future projects or to use at home. Learn different methods to creating the infusions and which herbs work best and their various properties. We'll also be creating pulse blend remedies for using aromas on the go. The manual you receive means they're also easy to adapt for making more at home. All Ingredients are included in project cost and all equipment will be provided. Reiki Dojo - Reiki Courses and Training
There are four levels of Usui Reiki Training available at Brookes Therapies. We begin with Level One, and go right through to Master Teacher level. Sudents are supported throughout their Reiki journey and regular Reiki share circles and practical opportunities are organosed. We also have additional Meditaion classes, Crystal Therapy training and workshops.
Reiki Training - Payment Plans available on request
Reiki Level One - £150
Reiki level Two - £150
Reiki Master - £250
Reiki Teacher - £350
Level One
Level One Reiki training includes 4 powerful attunements throughout the 2 day course and is focussed on the basic practice of Reiki, the precepts and how to deliver self healing treatemnts. You will follow a 21 day 'Cleanse' following your course where you will try to perform Reiki on yourself daily, just for short periods and maintain a learning gratitude journal noting down any changes, challenges and benefits you are noticing. Regular practice helps you to become really comfortable with delivering Reiki and attuning your life gradually to the simple precepts. You may notice signifcant shifts in energy and feelings of enhanced wellbeing and comfort as you practice, although everyone's experience is different.
Reiki can be added to standard facial and massage treatments to create a bespoke session. Chakra Balancing, Crystals and pendulum work can also be included.
Reiki training - coming soon, please contact us if you are interested in joining a course as they are held throughout the year.

Brookes Therapies & Wellbeing
Therapies and Education for Body and Mind
Welcome to Brookes Therapies, where the art of touch meets the science of healing.
Our specialised, inclusive massage practice is dedicated to helping you achieve profound relaxation, pain relief, and holistic wellbeing in a safe, nurturing environment. Our treatments are always tailored to each ndividual client to maximise your outcomes. But that's not all; we go beyond the ordinary. In addition to our exceptional massage services, we offer accredited professional therapy training programs for those who are passionate about the art of healing and want to make a meaningful difference in the lives of others.
We offer a range of holistic therapies - aromatherapy massage, deep tissue massage, hot stone massage, Reflexology, facials, Reiki, chakra balancing, Indian Head massage and combination treatments.
At Brookes Therapies, we understand that each individual is unique, with their own specific needs and concerns. Our team of highly skilled and certified massage therapists are committed to delivering personalised massage experiences that cater to your exact requirements. Whether you seek relief from chronic pain, stress reduction, or simply want to indulge in a luxurious spa-like experience, we have the expertise to guide you.
But that's not where our commitment to healing ends. If you're inspired to delve deeper into the world of therapeutic touch and embark on a career path in holistic healing, our accredited professional therapy training programs are designed just for you. Our comprehensive courses are taught by our industry experts, equipping you with the skills and knowledge needed to become a certified massage therapist, ensuring you're fully prepared not only to make a positive impact on the lives of your future clients but to launch a succesful and thriving therapy business.
Discover a world of natural therapies and techniques designed to help you stay well and feel better. Our mission is for our clients to leave us feeling better than when they arrived and our consistent 100% 5 star reviews suggest we are definitely achieving this!
Explore our website to learn more about our services and training programs, and join us on a journey toards feeling amazing!
The lead therapist, training principal and business owner Lindsey Brookes, has been practising complementary and holistic therapies since 2010 and teaching since 2017. The practice is committed to promoting wellbeing and health support using natural, ethical, and environmentally sound products and techniques.

Resting heat periods are interspersed with heated massage periods to really allow the gentle heat to permeate the muscles. A great gift for that stressed couple you love or a fab treat for friends, siblings, parents and adult offspring..
